# Text & Fonts Reference documentation for text rendering and font handling in Vista Graphics. ## Text Topics - [Text Rendering](/wiki/graphics/text-fonts/text-rendering/) - Text command usage - [Font Settings](/wiki/graphics/text-fonts/font-settings/) - Font command and properties - [Text Alignment](/wiki/graphics/text-fonts/text-alignment/) - Text-baseline, text-align - [Typography Tips](/wiki/graphics/text-fonts/typography-tips/) - Best practices ## Text Example `draw canvas [ font "Arial" 16 text "Hello, World!" 100 100 ]` ## See Also - [Drawing](/wiki/graphics/drawing/) - Drawing reference - [Concepts](/wiki/graphics/concepts/) - Graphics fundamentals
